description:
**✨ Update Available – update now for better experience ✨**

Your app has been gently updated with thoughtful improvements to support your reading journey.

---

**Here’s what’s new and meaningful in this update:**

**🖼️ New Pictures Added in Gallery**
Explore new spiritually inspired visuals added to the image collection.

**📖 New References Added**
Helpful new references added across books and teachings to deepen your understanding.

**📺 New ALRA TV Feed Integrated**
Stay up to date with the latest spiritual videos and talks from ALRA TV — now live in-app.

**🔢 Abjad Name Calculator Added**
Find the spiritual value of any name using the ancient Abjad system.

**🌗 Dark & Light Mode**
Choose the reading mode that feels right for your moment — bright or restful.

**🎨 Peaceful, Beautiful Color Themes**
Soft, modern tones designed to make your experience more enjoyable and calming.

**🧭 Simplified Navigation**
A cleaner, clearer way to explore — so you can focus on what truly matters.

**⚡ Better Performance**
Faster, smoother, and more stable — because ease matters.

---

**Take a moment. Open the app. Feel the difference.**
Update now and enjoy a more mindful, beautiful reading space.
